name: Bottle Sniper Expert
description:
Blast bottles with bullets of gun to get extreme broken glass sound. To become a real bottle hunt master is not easy as every round get harder and harder in this bottle shoot game. Get ready for expert 3D flip bottle shooter action game to become expert glass bottle shooter. Enjoy bottle break with bullets of handgun in realistic fps training zone.

Key features :
* Realistic Bottles
* Realistic sound of broken glass
* Cool sounds effects and engaging game-play
* Very cool effects
* 3D effect game
* Perfect stone shooter
